name: My Pony Dress Up - Game For Kids
name_original: My Pony Dress Up - Game For Kids
description:
Dress up your pony from mane to tail in tons of cool cute clothes and accessories. Choose fabulous hairstyles and sparkling jewelry!

Features:
❤ Hundreds of Cute Clothes
❤ Draw Tattoo
❤ Apple-Gathering;
❤ Race against other ponies
❤ 3D Dress Up
❤ 6 Exciting Games in 1 App!

Pony games:
- Racing;
- Flying;
- Puzzles;
